claim: Our search yielded 2,745 records, with 1,841 records remaining after removing duplicates (Fig. 1).
title: Fig. 1.
caption: PRISMA flow diagram for study selection

claim: Our results show that publications applying systems science approaches to domestic- and gender-based violence have been increasing in recent years, with increased ABM, SNA, and NA studies but decreased SD studies over time (Fig. 2).
title: Fig. 2.
caption: Number of domestic and gender-based violence systems science papers, by publication year and study typea,b. a Papers “in press” at the time of writing were included in the 2018–2022 category. b Abbreviations: ABM – agent-based modeling; NA – network analysis; SD – system dynamics; SNA – social network analysis
